instructions.1: Heat oil in a deep saute pan over medium heat. Add garlic, and cook until just golden, 1 to 2 minutes. Add 1/4 teaspoon pepper and 1/2 teaspoon salt.
instructions.2: Bring a large pot of water to a boil; add pasta and 2 1/2 teaspoons salt. Cook until al dente; drain, and set aside.
instructions.3: Meanwhile, add clam juice and wine to saute pan, and cook until liquid is reduced by a third, 3 to 5 minutes. Add clams, capers, and red-pepper flakes; cover, and cook until clams open, 10 to 12 minutes; discard unopened clams. Whisk in butter and parsley. Toss with pasta. Season with salt and pepper, and serve.

questions.question: In Step 3, is the pasta from Step 2 being used?
Is pasta from Step 2 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is garlic from Step 1 still available in Step 2?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
If we skip Step 2, is it still valid to use the pasta in Step 3?
Can we heat (Step 1) and bring (Step 2) at the same time?
